casebody.data:
Martin H. JOHNSON, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 2011-5094. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 9, 2012. *884Michael D.J. Eisenberg, Law Office of Michael D.J. Eisenberg, of Washington, DC, argued for plaintiff-appellant. Eric P. Bruskin, Trial Attorney, Commercial Litigation Branch, Civil Division, United States Department of Justice, of Washington, DC, argued for defendantappellee. With him on the brief were Tony West, Assistant Attorney General, Jeanne E. Davidson, Director, and Martin F. Hockey, Jr., Assistant Director.

RADER, Chief Judge, PLAGER and LOURIE, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This Cause having been heard and considered, it is

Ordered and Adjudged:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
